name: Motor Duel
overview: A one or two player game that supports computer to computer connections to allow you to play against another nearby Amiga or to play against the computer. Hope you bought the RAM plates because you are going head to head with another well armed vehicle. Get them in your sights and put some lead into them, but crashing into walls or your opponent will decrease your shield strength. Remember you only have so many rounds to fire and only so much time to fire them in!
